name: Sift
headline: The Leader in Digital Trust & Safety
description: Sift is the leader in Digital Trust & Safety, empowering digital disruptors to Fortune 500 companies to unlock new revenue without risk. Sift dynamically prevents fraud and abuse through industry-leading technology and expertise, an unrivaled global data network of 70 billion events per month, and a commitment to long-term customer partnerships. Global brands such as DoorDash, Twitter, and Wayfair rely on Sift to gain a competitive advantage in their markets.

founders.name: Jason Tan, Founder/Executive Chairman
founders.description: I'm an engineer/entrepreneur with a passion for great products and amazing people. I love to learn, whether it be from books or people, and constantly challenge myself and others to be better. I thrive off positive energy and feed it right back. I believe there's opportunity everywhere you look -- the world is only as small as you make it.

### Sift Named a Leader in the Forrester Wave™ for Digital Fraud Management
See why Sift was named a Leader in the inaugural Forrester Wave™ for Digital Fraud Management. The report cites Sift as a Leader in digital fraud management, with 5/5 ratings in the chargeback management, nonpayment fraud and policy abuse, and roadmap criteria.
[Read Report](https://sift.com/</resources/ebooks/forrester-wave-digital-fraud-management-report>)
![](https://sift.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fmedia.sift.com%2Fapp%2Fuploads%2F2024%2F05%2FForrester-Wave-Black-284x284-CTA.png&w=750&q=75)
![yellow-graphic](https://sift.com/yellow-shadow.svg)
[Read Report](https://sift.com/</resources/ebooks/forrester-wave-digital-fraud-management-report>)
## The Sift Difference
Own the risk-reward equation with Sift’s scalable, AI-powered decisioning platform and on-demand expertise. Eliminate digital pain points through deep, user-level insights, and secure measurable growth with our immense data consortium covering a global spectrum of markets and merchants.
[Explore Sift’s Strengths](https://sift.com/</why-sift>)
![graphic](https://sift.com/_next/image?url=%2Fbackground_blue_with_yellow_boreder.png&w=2048&q=75)
![](https://sift.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fmedia.sift.com%2Fapp%2Fuploads%2F2024%2F02%2FThe-Sift-Difference.png&w=1920&q=75)
[](https://sift.com/</why-sift#leadership>)
![shadow-blue](https://sift.com/shadow-blue.svg)

### The Only Independent Leader in AI-led Risk Decisioning
[![logo-1](https://media.sift.com/app/uploads/2024/09/FraudDetection_Leader_Leader.svg)](https://sift.com/<https:/www.g2.com/products/sift-digital-trust-safety-sift/reviews>)[![logo-2](https://media.sift.com/app/uploads/2024/09/FraudDetection_Leader_Enterprise_Leader.svg)](https://sift.com/<https:/www.g2.com/products/sift-digital-trust-safety-sift/reviews>)[![logo-3](https://media.sift.com/app/uploads/2024/09/FraudDetection_Leader_Mid-Market_Leader.svg)](https://sift.com/<https:/www.g2.com/products/sift-digital-trust-safety-sift/reviews>)[![logo-4](https://media.sift.com/app/uploads/2024/09/FraudDetection_MomentumLeader_Leader.svg)](https://sift.com/<https:/www.g2.com/products/sift-digital-trust-safety-sift/reviews>)
## The Sift Platform
Join Sift’s legacy of leadership in AI-driven, enterprise-grade risk decisioning. Precise, user-level signals throughout the user journey turn fraud challenges into a roadmap for secure, scalable growth.
[Platform Overview](https://sift.com/</platform>)
![graphic](https://sift.com/_next/image?url=%2Fbackground_blue_with_yellow_boreder.png&w=2048&q=75)
![](https://sift.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fmedia.sift.com%2Fapp%2Fuploads%2F2024%2F02%2FSift-Platform-Wheel.png&w=1920&q=75)
[](https://sift.com/</platform#platform>)
![yellow graphic](https://sift.com/yellow-bg-stats.svg)1
#### Redefine Risk Operations 
Growth gets faster with every signal, narrowing the gap between security and profitability.
[](https://sift.com/</platform#innovation>)
![yellow graphic](https://sift.com/yellow-bg-stats.svg)2
#### Outpace Competitors
Innovation = expectation with data and AI-fueled decisioning built on 12+ years of tuning.
[](https://sift.com/</platform#partner-ecosystem>)
![yellow graphic](https://sift.com/yellow-bg-stats.svg)3
#### Connect with Confidence
Stack-critical integrations refine operations by tethering mixed data directly to outcomes.
## Risk Decisioning Pain Points, Solved
Challenges reveal opportunities for growth with AI-fueled detection and analysis. Break into bigger and brand new markets confidently, face fraud hurdles head on, and secure every stage of the user journey.
[Explore All Sift Solutions](https://sift.com/</platform>)
Account Takeover
Payment Fraud
Money Movement

Policy Abuse
Content Scams
![](https://sift.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fmedia.sift.com%2Fapp%2Fuploads%2F2024%2F02%2FAccountTakeover_Solutions_Teaser.png&w=1920&q=75)
### Make users untouchable with bulletproof account protection.
Sift Account Defense easily handles bot-based account attacks at scale, and instantly identifies ATO at login with:
  * Unmatched accuracy and speed
  * AI-fueled agility and adaptability
  * Accelerated decisioning and advanced APIs


[Learn more](https://sift.com/</solutions/ato>)
## From Global SMBs to IPOs, Leaders Scale Securely with Sift
[View All Customer Stories](https://sift.com/</resources/case-studies>)
![](https://sift.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fmedia.sift.com%2Fapp%2Fuploads%2F2024%2F02%2Fdoordash-logo-black%402x-3.png&w=640&q=75)

#### Cameron Javier
Software EngineerDoorDash

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Sift**

Founded in 2011, Sift is a San Francisco-based company that's established itself as a leader in Digital Trust & Safety. Originally part of Y Combinator's Batch S11, Sift has evolved from its beginnings to serve a wide range of clients, from ambitious digital disruptors to Fortune 500 companies. The core mission? To help these businesses unlock new revenue streams while dynamically preventing fraud and abuse. 

### What They Do
Sift harnesses cutting-edge technology alongside vast expertise to combat digital threats. Their impressive global data network processes around 70 billion events each month, enabling a robust fraud detection and prevention framework. Major brands such as DoorDash, Twitter, and Wayfair trust Sift to enhance their security measures, securing a competitive edge in their respective markets.

### Key Features
- **AI-Powered Decisioning**: Sift uses advanced machine learning and AI to provide precise insights, transforming risk management from a liability into a growth opportunity.
- **Comprehensive Solutions**: They offer tailored approaches to various sectors, addressing cases like account takeovers, payment fraud, chargeback fraud, and policy abuse, spanning industries like e-commerce, fintech, and iGaming.
- **Platform Capabilities**: The Sift platform includes functions for robust Payment Protection, Account Defense, Dispute Management, and Content Integrity—all designed to streamline user experience while mitigating fraud risks.

### Community and Partnerships
Sift’s strength lies in its community and partnerships. They boast collaboration with numerous professionals and organizations in the space, which enriches their collective intelligence around fraud prevention. This is bolstered by over 700 global brands using their technology, highlighting their reliability and effectiveness across different markets.

### Recognition
Sift continues to be recognized for its innovation and leadership in digital fraud management. Recently, they were named a "Strong Performer" by Forrester and also clinched the number one spot in G2’s Fall 2024 Fraud Reports, underscoring their influential position in the fintech landscape.

### Learn More
To explore Sift's offerings and how they can benefit your business, visit their [official website](https://sift.com/). Whether you're looking to enhance your fraud prevention strategies or navigate the complexities of digital risk, Sift provides the tools and insights to grow fearlessly in a digital world. 

In a nutshell, Sift transforms how companies deal with risk by turning challenges into pathways for growth—ultimately redefining the narrative around digital safety.
